trans-unit.source: Property to provide storage for ADAL's token cache.
trans-unit.target: Property to provide storage for ADAL's token cache.

trans-unit.source: By default, <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext.TokenCacheStore</codeEntityReference> is set to a <codeEntityReference>Dictionary</codeEntityReference> which makes token cache an in-memory collection of key/value pairs.
trans-unit.target: By default, <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext.TokenCacheStore</codeEntityReference> is set to a <codeEntityReference>Dictionary</codeEntityReference> which makes token cache an in-memory collection of key/value pairs.

trans-unit.source: ADAL will automatically save tokens in the cache whenever you obtain them.
trans-unit.target: ADAL will automatically save tokens in the cache whenever you obtain them.

trans-unit.source: Cached tokens in the default cache store will be only available to the same instance of <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">T:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext</codeEntityReference>, so to use cache effectively, the <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">T:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext</codeEntityReference> instance should be reused.
trans-unit.target: Cached tokens in the default cache store will be only available to the same instance of <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">T:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext</codeEntityReference>, so to use cache effectively, the <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">T:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext</codeEntityReference> instance should be reused.

trans-unit.source: To disable token caching, set <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext.TokenCacheStore</codeEntityReference> to null in the constructor.
trans-unit.target: To disable token caching, set <codeEntityReference autoUpgrade="true" qualifyHint="false">P:System.IdentityModel.Clients.ActiveDirectory.AuthenticationContext.TokenCacheStore</codeEntityReference> to null in the constructor.
